application.doc: Retrieving an authorization server runtime configuration file

param.name: resource_id
param.doc: Name of the configuration file to retrieve. A valid configuration file name is one of pd.conf, or ldap.conf.

method.name: GET
method.doc: To retrieve an authorization server instance configuration file with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the advanced configuration URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
